SEARCH
Package gw.plugin.policy.refresh.ui

Class DiffDisplays

java.lang.Object
gw.plugin.policy.refresh.ui.DiffDisplays
public class DiffDisplays extends Object
Static utilities for working with DiffDisplays. In Gosu these methods are also available via enhancements on the DiffDisplay interface.

This follows the Java naming convention, similar to the Collections class for working with Collection objects.

  • Method Details

    • getAllChildren

      public static List<DiffDisplay> getAllChildren(DiffDisplay parent)
      Returns all children of the given DiffDisplay, if any.
      Parameters:
      parent - The parent diff display
      Returns:
      All children of the parent

    • getVisibleChildren

      public static List<DiffDisplay> getVisibleChildren(DiffDisplay parent)
      Returns all the visible children of the given DiffDisplay, if any.
      Parameters:
      parent - The parent diff display
      Returns:
      All visible children of the parent

    • hasDeepChanges

      public static boolean hasDeepChanges(DiffDisplay root)
      Check if the given root display object or any of its children (recursively) have changes. An object is considered to be changed if its type is not UNCHANGED. This method recurses using the HierarchicalDiff.getAllChildren() method, that is it examines all children, not just the visible ones.
      Parameters:
      root - the root display object
      Returns:
      true if any changes are found, false otherwise

    • getDeepMessages

      public static UIMessageList getDeepMessages(DiffDisplay root, PolicyRefreshMessageContext ctx)
      Accumulate and return all the messages from given root display object and all of its children (recursively). This method recurses using the HierarchicalDiff.getAllChildren() method, that is it examines all children, not just the visible ones.
      Parameters:
      root - the root display object
      ctx - contains policy graph beans pointed to by claim beans
      Returns:
      a newly allocated UIMessageList, never null
